Articles.Content:
Greetings fellow space geeks, gamers and any other class of folks who enjoy this game. I seem to recall trying Kerbal some time ago, back when it was free, but then I forgot about it for awhile. Finally decided to buy a copy and I've been loving it ever since. I'm a long time flight-simmer but space sims not so much, so this is relatively new to me. I've researched the planets, discovered the joys of mechjeb, learned a good bit about orbital mechanics and even got some Kerbals to the Mun and back. And it's just now officially in Beta? Meaning there's more to come? Wow, was worth the purchase even before the latest update in my opinion. I see this forum is extremely active, so I look forward to learning even more here.

- Luke

Can you eat 50 boiled eggs?

I've never tried, but I would guess that I can not.

/goin' to the Mun here, boss
